description: Applying Machine learning in ecommerce businesses to create a more personalized customer experience.

extras.2: Improving search results using Personalized Search engine

description: Worked on various stages of deep learning project, from the implementation of a data lake to developing computer vision models for Image Classification, Object Localization, Semantic Segmentation, etc.
Developed a platform to filter the output file of Mass Spectroscopy machine as per the requirements of Data Scientists.
Created a bridge between Medical Record Systems(OpenMRS) and reporting and analysis tool(DHIS2), primarily to represent the medical data graphically.
